ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Ulysses Cosmic Ray and Solar Particle Investigation (COSPIN) Low Energy Telescope (LET) Oxygen, Nitrogen, and Neon PHA based Fluxes in ASCII Format, 20 day Average Data
ResourceHeader.Description: This Data Set contains 20 day Average PHA based Fluxes of Oxygen (4-8, 8-12, 12-16, 16-20 MeV/n), Nitrogen (4-7, 8-20 MeV/n), and Neon (4-8, 9-30 MeV/n), and the Poisson Uncertainties in those Fluxes
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the COSPIN PI, R. Bruce McKibben, the lead LET Co-PI, Richard G. Marsden, and the UDS and/or NSSDC

InformationURL.Name: The Ulysses Cosmic Ray and Solar Particle Investigation, COSPIN
InformationURL.Description: Published Description of the COSPIN Instrumentation, J.A. Simpson et al., Astron. Astrophys. Suppl. Ser. 92, 365-399, 1992. See especially Section 4.1 for a detailed Description of the High Energy Telescopes, HET. An electronic Copy of this Paper is available at http://adsbit.harvard.edu/cgi-bin/nph-iarticle_query?1992A%26AS...92..365S&defaultprint=YES&filetype=.pdf.

InformationURL.Name: User Notes for the COSPIN/LET Data Files
InformationURL.Description: The User Notes File at the Ulysses Final Archive (UFA) describes the Format of the ASCII Data Files for the COSPIN Low Energy Telescope, LET, 20 day Average Oxygen, Nitrogen, and Neon PHA based Fluxes

InformationURL.Name: COSPIN/LET Handbook and other Documentation
InformationURL.Description: This PDF File at the Ulysses Final Archive (UFA) COSPIN Low Energy Telescope, LET, Handbook and many other appended Documents

AccessURL.Name: Ulysses Final Archive Access to COSPIN/LET 20 day Average Oxygen, Nitrogen, and Neon PHA based Fluxes
AccessURL.Description: ASCII Data File containing all Ulysses COSPIN/LET 20 day Average Oxygen, Nitrogen, and Neon PHA based Fluxes

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge Richard G. Marsden, ESA/ESTEC

Parameter.Name: Time for the record
Parameter.Description: Time for the record given in Year, Day of Year and Hour. The given time represents the middle of the averaging interval.

Parameter.Name: COSPIN/LET 20 day Average 4-8 MeV/n Oxygen PHA Derived Fluxes (O1)
Parameter.Description: LET 20 day Average PHA based Oxygen fluxes between 4 and 8 MeV/n
